description: The Heavenly Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Heavenly Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Heavenly Mountain for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Heavenly Mountain
shortDescription: The Heavenly Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Heavenly.
